name: House of Snark 6-in-1 Bundle
description: This is a huge collection of games that includes 3 Collector's Editions and 3 steampunk games! Snark Busters: Welcome to the Club Snark Busters: High Society Snark Busters: All Revved Up House of 1000 Doors: Family Secrets Collector's Edition House of 1000 Doors: Palm of Zoroaster Collector's Edition House of 1000 Doors: Serpent Flame...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
